fullDescription.intro:
Retrieves Sequences from NCBI Nucleotides.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: words surrounded by two hashes will be replaced by the column value. ( Example: ##CHROM## )
Maximum sequence length to be fetched

ports.inPort: A table containing some entrez identifiers
ports.outPort: Appends the sequence found in NCBI Entrez/Nucleotide
